Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents an AI system project for compliance tracking.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer associated with the project.

useCase.description: The use case for the AI system.

systemType.description: The type of the AI system.

riskCategory.description: The risk category of the project.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the project was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the project was last updated.

businessContext.description: The business context of the project.

intendedUsers.description: The intended users of the AI system.

geographicScope.description: The geographic scope of the project.

legalRequirements.description: Legal requirements such as GDPR, MDR, AI Act, etc.

dataCategories.description: Categories of data used by the system.

dataSources.description: Sources of the data used by the system.

lifecycleModel.description: The lifecycle model used for the project.

notes.description: Notes related to the project lifecycle.

lastReview.description: The timestamp of the last review.

functionalRequirements.description: Functional requirements for the AI system.

nonFunctionalRequirements.description: Non-functional requirements for the AI system.

designChoices.description: Design choices such as model selections, guardrails, and prompts.

architectureSummary.description: A summary of the system's architecture.

dataArchitecture.description: The architecture of the data processing and storage.

performanceObjectives.description: The performance objectives for the AI system.

explainabilityStrategy.description: The strategy for ensuring explainability of the AI system.

toolchain.description: Toolchain used for the project (e.g., GitHub, Firebase, Azure).

devEnvironment.description: The development environment for the project.

codingStandards.description: Coding standards applied to the project.

dependencyList.description: A list of dependencies for the project.

modelVersion.description: The version of the model used.

testApproach.description: The approach for testing the AI system.

securityControls.description: Security controls implemented for the AI system.

hasTrainingPhase.description: Indicates if the project has a training phase.

datasetDescription.description: Description of the dataset used for training.

biasAssessment.description: Assessment of potential bias in the data or model.

trainingProcedure.description: The procedure used for training the model.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Criteria for accepting the validation results.

robustnessTests.description: Tests for the robustness of the system.

independentReview.description: Information about any independent review of the validation.

infrastructure.description: The infrastructure used for deployment (e.g., Firebase, GCP, Azure).

loggingPolicy.description: The logging policy for the deployed system.

secretsManagement.description: How secrets are managed in the deployment environment.

monitoringSetup.description: The monitoring setup for the deployed system.

monitoringProcedures.description: Procedures for monitoring the AI system in operation.

driftDetection.description: Methods for detecting model or data drift.

incidentHandling.description: Process for handling incidents related to the AI system.

modelUpdatePolicy.description: Policy for updating the model in production.

userFeedbackProcess.description: Process for collecting and acting on user feedback.

loggingRetention.description: Policy for retaining logs from the AI system.

retirementPlan.description: The plan for retiring the AI system.

dataMigrationPlan.description: The plan for migrating data upon system retirement.

dataDestructionProcedures.description: Procedures for destructing data upon system retirement.

userCommunicationPlan.description: The plan for communicating the system retirement to users.

archiveLocation.description: The location where the retired system and its data will be archived.

conditionsForRetirement.description: Conditions that must be met for the system to be retired.

RiskRegisterEntry.title: Risk Register Entry
RiskRegisterEntry.description: An entry in the risk register for a project.

impact.description: Impact of the risk if it occurs (1-5).

isoControls.description: ISO controls related to the risk (e.g., A.5.x).

owner.description: The owner responsible for the risk.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the risk was last updated.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: A document associated with a project.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was uploaded.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores individual AI project compliance data.

/projects/{projectId}/riskRegister/{risk.description: Subcollection for the risk register of a specific project.

/projects/{projectId}/documents/{documen.description: Subcollection for documents related to a specific project.
